CustomField.formula: AND( OR( RecordType.DeveloperName = 'Business_Development', RecordType.DeveloperName = 'Product_Integrations' ), OR( CONTAINS(Products_Selected__c, 'Accounts API'), CONTAINS(Products_Selected__c, 'PSP Crypto Settlement'), CONTAINS(Products_Selected__c, 'Cybavo VAULT'), CONTAINS(Products_Selected__c, 'Cybavo Cashflow Manager'), CONTAINS(Products_Selected__c, 'Blockchain Partnerships'), CONTAINS(Products_Selected__c, 'Incentives'), CONTAINS(Products_Selected__c, 'Institutional Trading Partnership'), CONTAINS(Products_Selected__c, 'Loans'), CONTAINS(Products_Selected__c, 'Channel Sales'), CONTAINS(Products_Selected__c, 'Referrals'), CONTAINS(Products_Selected__c, 'Product Integrations'), CONTAINS(Products_Selected__c, 'Indirect Liquidity Partners'), CONTAINS(Products_Selected__c, 'Verite') ) )
CustomField.label: Needs Product Approval
